channel.title: How do I fix my Pernix Coif/Battlemage Helm/Trickster Helm?
channel.description:
Well the title says what I need, here is a picture of what they look like:
Trickster: [img]http://i.imgur.com/FWZYf.jpg[/img]
Battlemage: [img]http://i.imgur.com/oRuvT.jpg[/img]
Pernix: [img]http://i.imgur.com/frbVp.jpg[/img]
It would mean a lot if somebody could help me. Thanks. :)

item.title: How do I fix my Pernix Coif/Battlemage Helm/Trickster Helm?
item.dc:creator: @cedrick cedrick
item.description:
@cedrick wrote:

you need new models and/or load your character to 614

find 614 character models on google

Read full topic
